title: Break the formation (1)
description:
Now that the archers' raid has failed, the orcs are trying to mow us down with lines of axemen.

Break their formation and crush their spirit!

Use the :nth-of-type() pseudo-class to select each oddly-positioned orc:

element:nth-of-type()

Hint: there are two ways to do it. Either use the 'odd' keyword, or write in a 2n + 1 equation.
